exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros u l Hlim Hneq0. unfold is_lim_seq in *. unfold Rbar_locally in *. unfold filterlim in *. unfold Rbar_inv. destruct l. - intros P [eps Heps]. specialize (Hlim eps). specialize (Hlim Heps). destruct Hlim as [N HN]. exists N. intros n Hn. specialize (HN n Hn). rewrite Rabs_Rinv. + apply HN. + apply Rgt_not_eq. apply Rlt_gt. apply Hneq0. - intros P HP. specialize (HP 1). destruct HP as [N HN]. exists N. intros n Hn. specialize (HN n Hn). apply Rinv_neq_0_compat. apply Hneq0.
